upcomingSeminars.title: Urban Mobility Patterns Post-Pandemic
upcomingSeminars.speaker: Dr. Sarah Chen
upcomingSeminars.abstract: This seminar examines the lasting changes in urban mobility patterns following the global pandemic, with particular focus on public transit recovery and micromobility adoption rates.

upcomingSeminars.title: Autonomous Vehicle Integration in Mixed Traffic
upcomingSeminars.speaker: Prof. Michael Roberts
upcomingSeminars.abstract: An analysis of the challenges and opportunities presented by autonomous vehicles operating in mixed traffic environments with human drivers.

upcomingSeminars.title: Sustainable Freight Logistics Networks
upcomingSeminars.speaker: Dr. Elena Martinez
upcomingSeminars.abstract: This presentation will explore optimization strategies for freight logistics networks to reduce emissions while maintaining economic viability.

pastSeminars.title: Equity Considerations in Transit Planning
pastSeminars.speaker: Dr. James Wilson
pastSeminars.abstract: A critical examination of equity factors in transit planning with case studies from major metropolitan areas.

pastSeminars.title: Machine Learning Applications in Traffic Flow Prediction
pastSeminars.speaker: Prof. Lisa Chang
pastSeminars.abstract: This seminar presents recent advances in applying machine learning techniques to predict and optimize traffic flow in urban environments.

pastSeminars.title: Transportation Infrastructure Resilience to Climate Change
pastSeminars.speaker: Dr. Carlos Mendez
